  • Approved through WMSU BOR no. 68 series of 2018
  • ISO 9901: 2015 Certidied
  • Issued CHED Certificate of Program Compliance (December 2014)
  • Re- Accredited with the Accrediting Agency of Chartered Colleges and Universities in the Philipppines (AACCUP) Level 2 as of August 1, 2018 to July 2022
  • Affliated with the Zamboanga Peninsula Council of Deans of Engineering Education and Department (ZPCDEED)
  • Received various recognitions and awards for Enviromental Protection and Prevention

MISSION

The Environmental Engineering Department will excel in Instruction, Research, Production, and Extension through innovative methodologies responsive to current and future environmental changes. It is committed to educating and producing top-quality environmental engineers who are trained and equipped with the knowledge and skills to protect and enhance environmental quality, hence support sustainable development.

VISION

We will be a nationally recognized accredited department and leading institution in environmental engineering education and research. Our graduates are sought-after environmental experts, imbued with sound Filipino values, productive, globally competitive, and deeply committed to community services.

FACULTY LEADERS

LEADERS

"A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others. -Douglas Macarthur".


Introducing the trailblazers of the Society of Environmental Engineers of the Philippines - WMSU Student Chapter, Embarking on their leadership journey for the S.Y 2023-2024.

EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVES

Graduates of the BS EnE program will:

  1. Establish an Environmental and Engineering career in industry, government, consulting or academia
  2. Commit to lifelong learning and professional development to stay current in technology and contemporary issues; and
  3. take on increasing levels of responsibility and leadership in technical and/or managerial role.

WE ENGINEER SOLUTIONS TO POLLUTION !
